basics.name: Özcan Zafer AYAN
basics.label: Frontend Developer
basics.summary:
My name is Zafer AYAN, and I'm a software engineer with over 8 years of experience designing, developing and maintaining fullstack web and mobile applications. 

I specialize in React Native development, with a proven ability to build rich, high-quality mobile apps for both iOS and Android platforms. I am also experienced in dealing with complex challenges that come with developing for multiple devices and different ways of interacting with them.

projects.name: Deepwall
projects.summary:
Created A/B template themes for Deepwall clients.

- Creating animated components according to Figma files.
- Building the Typescript-oriented architecture of the project
- Working on project analysis and scheduling meetings with stakeholders.
- Ensuring that the application works stably on various mobile devices.

projects.name: GetContact React Native Integration
projects.summary:
Created native libraries for iOS and Android applications to integrate React Native into native apps. Also written UI tests, created React Native Web integration for create storybook documentations.

- Building the architecture of the project
- Forming a sustainable and maintainable codebase.
- Safely transferring the sensitive information 
- Taking initiative in the subjects of UI/UX
- Working on project analysis and scheduling meetings with stakeholders.
- Ensuring that the application works stably on various mobile devices.
- Integrating FBsdk, Admob and ironsource advertisement platforms.
- Storybook documentations.
- Typescript written codebase and tests.
- Well defined webpack configurations.

projects.name: Fibabanka Video Onboarding Project
projects.summary:
This project offers those who want to become customers of the Fibabanka, without going to the branch, and becoming Fibabanka customers through the mobile application. My responsibilities in this project involve;


- Building the architecture of the project
- Forming a sustainable and maintainable codebase.
- Safely transferring the sensitive information 
- Taking initiative in the subjects of UI/UX
- Working on project analysis and scheduling meetings with stakeholders.
- Ensuring that the application works stably on various mobile devices.
- Creating the React-Native bridge modules for NFC SDK, FaceMatch SDK and Realtime Video Call SDK and providing the implementation of these SDKs.
